text: aur yadi tumhen pati-patnee ke beech bigaad ka bhay ho, to ek faisala karanevaala purush ke logon mein se aur ek faisala karanevaala stree ke logon mein se niyukt karo, yadi ve donon sudhaar karana chaahenge, to allaah unake beech anukoolata paida kar dega. nissandeh, allaah sab kuchh jaananevaala, khabar rakhanevaala hai
